posts.title: Japanese Katana Shift Knob
posts.content: Cut your drive time in half by weaving through traffic with ninja-like precision using this Japanese katana shift knob. Intricately styled to resemble the elaborate hilt of a traditional Japanese sword, it makes a great accent piece for any hot import.

posts.title: Digital Steak Thermometer
posts.content: Cook your premium slab of meat to perfection every time with this digital steak thermometer. This grill and oven friendly thermometer can accommodate up to 4 probes and simultaneously display their temperatures so that you can monitor all your steaks at once.

posts.title: Rubik’s Futuro Cube
posts.content: Experience the future of brain teasers with the Rubik’s Futuro Cube. Apart from the obvious, this LED lit cube comes with 14 built-in games, features a multi-player mode, and comes with access to a development kit that lets you design your own games.

posts.title: Housebreaking Dog Doorbell
posts.content: Train your pup to ring a bell when he wants to go outside by placing this housebreaking dog doorbell on your doorway. This adjustable belt comes fitted with small yet loud bells that will jingle to notify you when your doggy has to go outside.

posts.title: Doorbell Camera App
posts.content: See who is at the door without even being at home with this clever doorbell camera app. Every time someone’s at the door, you get a notification sent to your smart phone that gives you the option of either answering or ignoring them if it’s a unwanted solicitor.

posts.title: Beer Making Kit
posts.content: The beer making kit has just made your local watering hole obsolete. No longer must you traverse great distances in order to suckle from the life-giving nectar that is beer. Instead, you’ll be able to brew it to your exact liking in the comfort of your very own home.

posts.title: Guys Can Be Cat Ladies Too Book
posts.content: Learn the ins and outs of cohabitating with a feline from the informative “Guys Can Be Cat Ladies Too” book. This hilarious read sheds light on a multitude of cat related subjects such as how to pet them without getting mercilessly mauled by their razor sharp claws.

posts.title: LEGO X-Wing Starfighter Set
posts.content: Show your loyalty for the Rebel Alliance by adding your very own LEGO X-Wing Starfighter to your collection. This 731-piece set allows you to build a classic X-Wing complete with lever-activated wings, a retractable landing gear, and a LEGO Luke Skywalker and R2-D2!

posts.title: Cash Suit
posts.content: You may not be made of money, but why can’t your suit be? This highly fashionable two-buttoned cash suit envelops your manly frame in an attractive and eye-catching hundred dollar bill motif that’ll have you making it rain wherever you go.

posts.title: Do One Thing Every Day That Scares You
posts.content: Make life worth living by stepping out of your comfort zone using this “Do One Thing Every Day That Scares You” journal. This unique journal comes jam packed with a year’s worth of encouraging mottoes and fear-facing prompts to motivate you to get out there.

posts.title: Levitating Bluetooth Speaker
posts.content: Defy the laws of gravity next time you feel like grooving by blasting your tunes out of this levitating Bluetooth speaker. The innovative design wirelessly recharges as it floats and features a light up band that syncs to the music.

posts.title: Honey Syrup Dispenser
posts.content: Keep your honey jar un-stickified with the honey syrup dispenser. The dispenser holds your honey better than the bear from the grocery store since it cleverly pours your honey into your coffee or tea and then retracts so that the sticky goo is kept from the jar.
